```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(orcas)

data(cwr_tidy)
cwr_tidy %>% View()
```

```{r}
cwr_tidy %>% 
    count(location, sort = TRUE) %>% 
    View()
```


```{r}
cwr_tidy %>% 
    mutate(encounter_interval = int_length(interval(begin_time, end_time))) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(begin_longitude, begin_latitude, color = log(encounter_interval))) +
    geom_point()
```


```{r}
cwr_tidy %>% 
    ggplot() +
    geom_point(aes(begin_longitude, begin_latitude), color = "midnightblue") +
    geom_point(aes(end_longitude, end_latitude), color = "aquamarine")
```
